I don't have access to the GPU machine for now, when I do I'll try the `use_resource` flag. I'm closing this for now because I don't think there is anything to fix in TF, rather I need to redesign a few things to eliminate this op that requires so much vram in my final app.

But it's good to keep in mind that although TF maps memory of multiple GPUs, each op must fit into a single GPU, otherwise a memory allocation will be raised.
